text: Life at the Top is a 1965 British drama movie directed by Ted Kotcheff and was based on the novel of the same name by John Braine and is the sequel to the 1959 movie Room at the Top. It stars Laurence Harvey, Jean Simmons, Nigel Davenport, Honor Blackman, Michael Craig, Robert Morley, Allan Cuthbertson, Harry Fowler, Geoffrey Bayldon, David Oxley, Denis Quilley and was distributed by Columbia Pictures. ==Other websites== * Category:1965 drama movies Category:British drama movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Ted Kotcheff
title: Life at the Top
